title: Asparagus with Parmesan rice and lemon sabayon sauce

ingredients.content: 30 g Parmesan cheese, crust removed and cut into pieces (3 cm)
1 tsp Vegetable stock paste (refer to the recipe in The Basic Cookbook)

preparations.content: Place Parmesan cheese into mixing bowl and grate <b>10 sec/speed 10<b>. Transfer into a bowl and set aside.
Place water and stock paste into mixing bowl, insert simmering basket and weigh basmati rice into it.

Arrange asparagus into Varoma dish, stacking each layer in alternate directions to allow steam to circulate. Place Varoma into position, secure Varoma lid and steam <b>20 min/Varoma/speed 1<b>. Remove Varoma and remove simmering basket with aid of spatula, transfer rice onto a serving plate, drizzle with extra oil, cover and set aside. Check whether asparagus is cooked. If not, place Varoma back into position and steam for a further <b>5-10 min/Varoma/speed 1<b>.

Set covered Varoma aside onto a plate to keep asparagus warm. Tare scale to zero and transfer 120 g of the cooking liquid into a small bowl (scale will show ‘-120 g’ when mixing bowl is set back in position), discarding the rest. Set small bowl aside. Clean and dry mixing bowl.

hintsAndTricks: If using white asparagus, steam for a further <b>5 min/Varoma/speed 1<b> after removing simmering basket with rice.
